name: Grade Post Therapy
title: Grade Post Therapy
notes:
**Note 1:** Leave post-therapy grade blank when
* No neoadjuvant therapy
* Clinical or pathological case only
* There is only one grade available and it cannot be determined if it is clinical, pathological or post-therapy

**Note 2:** Grade is applicable for the follicular lymphomas only (9690/3, 9691/3, 9695/3, 9698/3).  For all other lymphoma histologies, code 9.

**Note 3:** Assign the highest grade from the resected primary tumor assessed after the completion of neoadjuvant therapy.

**Note 4:** Follicular lymphoma grade is based on the absolute number of centroblasts per high-power (40 x objective, 0.159 square mm) microscopic field (HPF).

**Note 5:** Codes 1-5 take priority over L.

**Note 6:** Code 9 when 
* Surgical resection is done after neoadjuvant therapy and grade from the primary site is not documented
* Grade checked “not applicable” on CAP Protocol (if available) and no other grade information is available
